Many copies of this record included copy-protection technology that prohibited consumers from digitizing their album. A limited edition [[digipak]] version of the album was also released, along with 1000 numbered double vinyl releases. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | total_length = | title1 = Monochrome | length1 = 5:00 | title2 = Call the Ships to Port | length2 = 4:56 | title3 = Bullet | length3 = 5:02 | title4 = Invisible & Silent | length4 = 4:38 | title5 = Prometheus | length5 = 5:40 | title6 = We Stand Alone | length6 = 5:29 | title7 = Rising Sun | length7 = 6:00 | title8 = Winter Comes | length8 = 4:56 | title9 = We Want Revolution | length9 = 4:44 | title10 = Scared | length10 = 6:59 | title11 = Atlas | length11 = 5:15 }} ==Bonus tracks== The vinyl release included four bonus tracks, including two exclusive tracks. # Bullet (Club version) - 5:35 # Call the Ships to Port (Club Version) - 6:04 # Bullet (Funky Indian) - 5:38 # Don't Go - 4:04 ==External links== * [http://www.industrial-music.com/product.php?prodnum=MET+261 Metropolis: Northern Light] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Covenant|album}} [[Category:2002 albums]] [[Category:Covenant albums]] {{2000s-pop-album-stub}}
